content: the paris sweater is worked in the round from the bottom up on 7 mm circular needles with 3 strands diablo held together size xs/s/m/l/xl circumference - chest 70 78 86 94 102 cm 27 5 30 7 34 37 40 2 length 59 62 5 66 69 5 73 cm 23 2 24 6 26 27 4 28 7 hobbii diablo 246yrds/225m 0 88oz/25g #20 olive - 9 12 12 15 15 circular needles 7mm 60cm double pointed needles dpns 7mm gauge 11 sts x 20 row = 10cm
